title: Spinning Around
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Emma-san, watch this, toryaaah~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ooooh~, you’re amazing, Rin-chan! You’re spinning around!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe, Rin loves the horizontal bar~! Next is.... like this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Waaah, you’re going the other way around!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>It’s called a pullover nya! Rin can do it 3 times in a row.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>You really are amazing, Rin-chan, I can’t spin around that much~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eeeeh, that’s not true! Even you can do it nya, Emma-san! Come on, Rin will teach you how, so let’s do it together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eeeeh!? I wonder if I can.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>It’s fiiine! You can do it if you try nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>When you say it like that, it feels like I really can do it, Rin-chan....! Then, Rin-chan, please be gentle with me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
